Articles.Content:
I have started another HypeTrain factory, called SunWorks, because of my username.

Please let GregroxMun see this. I spent 1 hour working on it. It has one engine and 1 car. Soon , it will be improved.

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="//imgur.com/a/Lq5mV/embed"></iframe>

Guys can we please leave the HypeVehicles for now? It's getting annoying.

Gotta close this, sorry.
